BBEX3.A.AZM.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Azerbaijan / USD 1 = AZM ... (middle)
General: Currency conversion with effect from 1 January 2006 at the rate of AZM 5,000 = AZN 1; for exchange rates as of 2006, see BBEX2:A:AZN:USD:CA:AC:A04.
Source: Since July 1998: National Bank of Azerbaijan, Baku.January - June 1998: International Bank of Azerbaijan, Baku.
Methodology: Since 2001, calculated on the basis of mid-month and month-end exchange rates, previously on the basis month-end rates.
